review_data.title: Charming
review_data.content: Took a last-minute, unplanned trip to Zurich without any plans or contacts in the area. Found this place on Google and walked from the train station as my first stop midafternoon. Glad I did. Liked it so much that I came back later in the...More

review_data.title: Super endroit avec chleureux accueil et pour les gens qui aiment la musique et fumer
review_data.content: Sebastiano a donné un petit bout de sa vie pour donner la meilleure ambiance possible à ce pub, qui, il...More

review_data.title: Best Guinness in Zurich!
review_data.content: Needs more customers, the Guinness is worth it ;). Nice place, nice bar man, good location. Really is the best Guinness in Zürich.

review_data.title: Great little pub
review_data.content: Love this place. Great for an afterwork beer or a bit of live music or karaoke on the weekend. Horseshoe bar adds to the cosy ambiance.

review_data.title: Much improved, good boozer.
review_data.content: I've been a few times recently for the rugby and for a couple of birthday parties, and am pleased to say Sebastian has greatly improved this place. Friendly & welcoming, always has a seat, good ribs, good service - a more relaxed alternative to Paddies....More

review_data.title: Very nice pub!
review_data.content: Since they’ve changed the manager, this pub is getting better and better! Nice decoration! Great service! It’s a place I always enjoy going!

review_data.title: Cheap try to get a piece of the Pub cake
review_data.content: I liked the 2. Akt because it never tried to be more than it is. The pub is just one of a few tries to create a pub by having green painted walls and wooden bar but no charme. Went there on a night out...More

review_data.title: Nice smoking area - warm tap beer
review_data.content: First the good things: they have a big seated smoking area and you always find a seat in this pub. It is almost never crowded (unlike the Paddy Reilleys). Last time my beer they served was too warm and when I complained she told me...More
